epic2.pull_request: PR #149 - Epic 2 - Task 2.5: Implement MHD Parser with TDD

recent_activities.description: Fixed Backend Lint failures in PR #173 by applying black formatting to I12 components. Updated CLAUDE.md with documentation for new StreamingJsonReader, PowerDataProcessor, I12StreamingParser, and PowerCacheService classes.
Resolved merge conflicts in PR #173 for all 5 files, maintaining black formatting style. All GitHub checks now passing.
Implemented specialized I12 streaming parser for 360K+ power data with memory optimization, multi-tier caching, database optimizations, and comprehensive error handling. Created PR #173.
Updated SQLAlchemy models to match exported JSON structure. Added 5 new models (Salvage, Recipe, RecipeSalvage, AttributeModifier, TypeGrade) and updated existing models. Created PR #171.

Analyzed MidsReborn architecture, created comprehensive integration plan, implemented proper initialization sequence in DataExporter. Created GitHub issues #161-164 for tracking MHD to JSON export implementation.
Implemented complete MHD parser with TDD approach, supporting binary and text formats, JSON export, and CLI interface. Fixed all CI issues and achieved passing tests.
Closed all Epic 1 GitHub issues, marked Epic 1 as fully complete
Implemented comprehensive database schema with SQLAlchemy models, Alembic migrations, and Pydantic schemas. Ready for data import phase.
